mapper.update: UPDATE homework set title=#{title}, course=#{course}, lastCommitDate=#{lastCommitDate}, briefInfo=#{briefInfo}, detailInfo=#{detailInfo} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, title, course, lastCommitDate, createDate, briefInfo, detailInfo from homework where id=#{id};
select h.id, h.title, c.name as course, h.lastCommitDate, h.createDate, h.briefInfo, h.detailInfo from homework h join course c on h.course=c.id where h.id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into homework( title, course, lastCommitDate, createDate, briefInfo, detailInfo ) values ( #{title}, #{course}, #{lastCommitDate}, #{createDate}, #{briefInfo}, #{detailInfo} )
